Ghar pe nahi batana hota aur sab kuch. Jeevan me sabse badi problem kya hai? - Let me guess. Swimming ke time muh se saas kaise lete hai? Har kaam itna seriosuly nahi hota hai aur. Thoda to comedy kar. Hamare saath reh ke tu duniya ke 90% boys conversation jaana hoga varna to aisa reality check aata ki _______.

Ek baar bas gaali sunni thi hum sabko tere muh se. Fir lagta kuch achieve kar liya. "Ghoorna" & "Corruption karna padega" is the funniest thing jo mujhe abhi yaad aa rahi hai. Rohit tu kitna funny hai‚Ä¶.tujhe shayad yaad nahi hoga, par apan first time chess khelte hue mile the, aur abhi tak mere phone me tera naam Rohit Chess IITGN save hai. G-218 se jab apni dosti gehri hui, tab maine aapse zindagi ke kayi rehasya jaane‚Ä¶Pehle To be decided sirf 4 logo ka group tha, par tu 5th aake kab ekdum ghul-mil gaya, pata hi nahi chala. Sabhi boring logo ke beech tu infotainment ka source tha. But I must say, your way of argumentation (grapes and w‚Ä¶) and sense of humour are fantastic. Tujhse bahut saari cheezein seekhi, aur kayi saari seekhna baaki hai. 
Mere kabhi dost nahi rahe, par tu unn logo me se ek hai jisne mujhe dosti ka matlab samjhaya, aur duniyadaari sikhayi. I know mai bahut saare questions puch kar pareshan karta tha, par tujhse question puchne me bhi alag hi maza aata tha. Apni endership bani rahe aur aap mekerkating nanalytics me top kare vaiya.

I don't know where to start, But from a random stranger jo mere room ka taala todne aaya tha to a best friend jiske bina to chalta hi nahi muje, this journey of our bond is the best route I have ever taken. I can't even imagine this journey without your constant support. You have made me smile during rough days; You are my safe place, where I retreat whenever a minor inconvenience arises. I will always cherish our laughter, fights, apani bakchodi, aur Haa meri tuje public me awkward karne ki koshishe jaari rahengi. At last, I want to thank you for existing and making my IIT years memorable and smoother.

Dear Aanchal,

As I sit down to write this message, I can't help but think back to the first time we met. It's still a mystery to me, but what's not a mystery is how much you've brightened up my life at IITGn. Without you, I can't even imagine how boring it would have been!

We've shared so many good times together, from our adventures at Aibaan to the ups and downs we've faced together. But what I cherish most about our friendship is how you've been like a second mom to me, always looking out for me and being there when I needed you the most. 
And let's not forget our shared love for music! It's amazing how we always seem to have the same taste in songs. I want to thank you for making Gujarat feel like a good space to me. Being away from home can be tough, but with you by my side, I always felt like I had a piece of home with me.

Thank you for being such an amazing friend, Aanchal. I'll cherish our memories together always.

Love,
Shofa Ben.

My nagarpagar, where do I even begin? You are undoubtedly one of the best things this college had to offer. You filled our lives with so much happiness. I am forced to type all this out as you have locked us in my room and would not let us leave till we finish filling the yearbook. JK JK. I have seen you grow so much these past two years. I have witnessed you winning so many battles the world does not even know of. You are one of the strongest and most passionate people I know. I will miss waking you up on holiday mornings for PE. I will miss the ‚ÄúLUNCH AT 12:15?‚Äù texts. My yoga partner, my philosophical walk partner. I had the best time spending that semester with you and samar as my roommates. It was the coziest and happiest time on campus for me. I couldn‚Äôt wait for the day to end so I could sit with you guys cuddled up inside that fluffy blanket and watch game of thrones. You two were nothing less of angels in these stressful two years of my life. There are so many more memories that I can‚Äôt even begin listing. Just know that I love you so much and will always be here for you forever and ever. Baki tum samjhdaar ho. Mwuahhh.

Jab bhi koi puchega how my college life had been, I am a hundred and one percent sure my mind would throw at me no one's but your face 44721915403 times. And why not? For you stuck with me throughout the four years. WTF? I pinched myself, and it's true!!! 

Chapter 1: Thanks for letting me laze around in your room 24/7 coming in with an excuse to 'group study' and ending up sleeping with half the syllabus due. Or eventually, thanks for letting me be your fourth roomie. I declared it myself, thanks. Achha waise, how was it that I studied more while you scored better? Apna bachpan se smart dialogue mat maarna, let us both agree that you can just mug up things better.
Chapter 2: Oh, so you are just going to talk to every-fucking-body else but me? And you wouldn't say why too? Well, great. Screw you, mofo.
Chapter 3: An overnight video call with not a single second of awkward pauses. What better way to start a semester woohoo! Wait, what?? We weren't talking for a year, were we? Meh. forget it. Let's keep the chitter-chatter rolling. Time for the thank you overdue. Thanks for dealing with my guards-up and guards-down oscillations, for standing by the shut door that remained shut, and yet, for breaking the ice all by yourself every single time. Definitely no thanks for cancelling up on the Goa trip, though.
Chapter 4: Oof! Honestly, kya batau? Aadhe time main soti reh gayi aur baaki time you tried waking me up and failed hahahaha. Achha, but seriously, the placements!!! My oh my. Anxiety, stress, negativity, and self-doubt ke beech, thank for always being there. Ek semester gaya in getting placed toh dusra gaya in deciding ek dusre se kaunse gifts lootenge after we start working. List bana lena mera, ek bhi gift kam nahi hona chahiye :)

All in all, zyada adventurous roller coaster kya tha? College - 0, Achal - 108!!!
Thank you for being an amazing friend! You're gonna do great things in life!

I don't know where should I start about you and our friendship. No words can express the bond we have (I hope the photo can do a little justice). From being the first person, I met from the batch to becoming the most important person in my life. I am always going to cherish that summer, with our spontaneous Ahmedabad trips and concerts, each of which has a different crazy story to it. Thank you for all the help with my thesis, for all the troubleshooting, you are indeed God. I know you are going to do great things and I admire your dedication for your work. Hey Praisy,

Wow, where do I even begin? You truly are a mix of everything, and I'm so grateful to have you as my best friend. You always create such a cozy and welcoming atmosphere. And let's not forget your heart of gold - you always put your friends first, and your kindness and thoughtfulness never go unnoticed.

But what really sets you apart is your ability to be both a deep thinker and an articulate speaker. Whether we're discussing the meaning of life or just catching up on the latest gossip, you always bring so much insight and perspective to the table. And I can't even count how many times you've remembered the little things - like my favorite snack (coin khakra) - it just shows how much you truly care about the people around you.

But let's be real, if you weren't a HSS student, you'd definitely be a nurse - you have such a caring and nurturing personality that would make you amazing in that field. And even though we're graduating soon and going our separate ways, I know that you'll continue to be the best friend anyone could hope for, no matter where life takes us.

So here's to you, Praisy - thank you for an amazing two years together, for being a comforting presence, and for always appreciating the beauty in life. You truly are one in a million, and I'm so lucky to call you my best friend.

To many more sky gazing sessions!!

Love you to the moon and back,
Shofa Ben

Hello to my only and best-ever roommate :) I think we're the rare people on campus who remember COVID with a certain fondness; who walk past the guesthouse and recollect a week-long period of intense bonding, laughter, and (fake) mcdonald's. I don't know how or when life got so busy that I didn't hang out enough with you after that, but it's always been in the back of my head that a fellow CEP is around somewhere, always accessible in case of a breakdown. I hope our paths keep crossing in the future too, and we keep floating in and out of each other's lives.

Sleep schedule theek karein, aur gym kariyega thora bangalore jaake to health badhiya rahega :3 Signing off.

My day isn‚Äôt complete without calling you or screaming rashuuu outside your door at least once and I can‚Äôt imagine not living next to you anymore. We went from wondering whether or not to come to campus to calling this place home real quick and I am so grateful to have had you by my side throughout this journey. From our first quarantine walk to endless walks along the same routes, there has never been a dull moment with you and we‚Äôve made innumerable memories together. From go insta sessions at 3 am to midnight food runs in Delhi. From Udaipur ki lemon tea to endless cups of chai at 2D and study sessions in CoLA Lab. From polo forest and crossing the border in a rickshaw for legal beer to all our Friday night shenanigans on campus. Thank you for making this place home, for making me nachos and pasta more times than I count, for listening to my endless rants and drama, for being there through everything and for taking care of me in more ways than I can count. kab mile the?! G218 roomies, hmmmmm. Kyu mile the? Project partners, hmmmmmm. Matlab koi insaan itna chuparustam kaise ho sakta hai! Dikhta kuch aur hai, and hai kuch aur. Dear King of Kerala,
I don‚Äôt even know where to begin tbh but I think I‚Äôd like to start by saying thank you. Thank you for being you ‚Äì super easy to talk to, approachable, honest and immensely caring. Thank you for helping me adjust to campus life, for listening to my endless rants and useless updates, for being one of my closest confidants and for always being there. Thank you for making sure I‚Äôm alive by making black coffee in sem 1 and endless cups of lemon tea now. Lastly, thank you for the memories. From cricket in Duven corridor to Sabarmati walks to getting scammed into cycling 26Kms, it‚Äôs all been fun with you around. We‚Äôve made it through our fair share of ups and downs and innumerable trivial arguments (yes, arguments) and I am glad we‚Äôre still friends at the end of it all. I promise to keep spamming you and annoying you for a long long while to come - Daks
PS: Yes, I am definitely the coooolest kid in the area and you were right to think we‚Äôd get along well.

Message:
Over the past two years, you have become more than just a friend to me. You have been a source of strength, support, and inspiration. You have been there for me through the good and bad, always ready with a listening ear and a comforting word.

Fuck shit! I have to write for you now? Fuck. But okay. Here we go! Dear Rashi! Hi. So it all happened somewhere between romantic comedy and psychothriller? Hmm. And I directed both of them? I know know. I took cerca.trova._ business too seriously. But who knew? Age is not just a number but a legal requirement to attend GenZ concerts but also to legally drink in Delhi. WOW! I do not know people of your age belongs in GenZ or the GenY. Anyways, we do listen to songs together that are for sure of not this era. Gotta save our music playlist. Please remind me. I know you will be reading this message in future. So here is the recent news. You are trying to find RA positions. You have iPhone 14 waiting back at home. Your experiments are hectic. You are confused between clinical and wet lab work. Vridhi is still being a pain in the ass. (I know Vridhi you are reading this. Fuck off from here!) 

Message from universe: You are the best. And best things have already happened to you. You are doing good and you are doing best. I believe in you. Take care, Rashu and Hihi!

Message: What kind of home do you live in that feels good to leave? One has to ponder. Moving on, I have never felt my reservoirs of jokes and supposedly funny phrases being so dry that I am forced to be sincere, but so shall be. Dear Sharma, you are one of the last few people I became friends with; I used to think that you were one of those strange, rude, and strangely rude "topper" kind of people, but I have never been more wrong (and I have been wrong many a time). I would not have known, had I not seen you jumping with all your knowledge of homemade remedies, staying up all night to help us who fell sick. Thanks to COVID, you transmogrified yourself into an angel in my eyes. You, lady, you have put me in so much debt. How can I ever repay? You are one of the nicest people I have ever met, one of the sweetest souls, and you are brilliant as heck! It's almost unfair for one person to have so many good qualities. You were the torch bearer of hope when life got dark (and damn, did it get dark here); you were my companion in celebrating my little wins. You have been a companion through thick and thin, and I shall remain grateful. I feel lucky to have you as my friend. Nothing but best wishes and loads of love!
Name: Soham
Chintalapati Sreevidya
Profile_Biography: Embracing the little things

Please, never change, Abhilasha. Stay the remarkable person you are, forever exuding that cool and collected vibe that brings so much comfort to those around you. You have a heart of gold, and the world is a brighter place with you in it.

Message: My dearest Ahhie, Words fail to express the sheer awe I feel when I think about how incredible you are. Your presence alone radiates cuteness, love, kindness, brightness, and positivity. You are a true embodiment of strength, my friend. No matter what challenges life throws your way, you never fail to ensure the happiness of those around you. However, if I may gently offer a suggestion, it would be for you to learn the art of saying "no." You have always been there for me, saying yes to every request since day one. While your kindness knows no bounds, it sometimes makes people like me, who lack the slightest ounce of shame, ask you to dye my hair even when you're knee-deep in your thesis and IN presentation. I truly appreciate your unwavering support, but I also want you to take care of yourself. Do you remember the very first reel we made together? Those moments are forever etched in my heart, and I consider myself incredibly lucky to have you as my companion in creating lifelong memories. You have a way of making every experience magical, and I am forever your biggest fan, starting from our ijokha days. May your light shine brighter with each passing day, Ahhie. You deserve all the love and happiness in the world. With boundless affection and admiration, Shofa Ben‚ù§Ô∏è
Name: Safa Fathim

Message: Dear Bhau, Your personality shines brightly, and it's truly a joy to be around someone as remarkable as you. You have a special knack for bringing out my musical side. Whenever I sing "Abhi Na Jao Chhod Kar," it never fails to touch your heart and stir emotions. It's incredible to witness the power of music and how it connects us, even when I stumble over the Hindi lyrics. Despite any language barriers, your ability to be moved by my singing speaks volumes about your empathetic and compassionate nature. Your soul is truly amazing, Bhau. I see the great potential and limitless possibilities ahead of you. May you soar to new heights, achieving all the success and happiness you deserve!! I am here cheering you on every step of the way.
Name: Safa Fathim

Message: Deekshu Ben,  You're an absolute gem with a personality that lights up every room you enter. Before I met you, I used to think I was a bad bi*ch, but then I met you and made me realize, it aint me, it is Deeksha who a bad bi*ch. I'll never forget that time, a year ago, when you said, "You always dress up like you're on the way to a mall." That moment transformed me forever, and now I embrace my own style, rocking the IIT-ian look in comfy pajamas all day long. Thank you for pointing out what I needed to see.  Your energy is contagious, and you're always on fire, blazing a trail wherever you go. Your straightforwardness and determination are incredibly inspiring, and I can't help but admire you. You're a true go-getter, fearlessly pursuing your dreams and leaving a trail of success in your wake.  Thank you for being you, Deekshu Ben. Your presence in my life is a gift I treasure dearly.

Message: "Dimag ka bh**da ho raha hai toh aankho ko toh sukoon mile" - I promise I am taking this to my grave üòÇ  Shreyash, kya gem aadmi he bhai tu! Bahar se pahele apni bholi bhali shakal se saamne vale ko trap karta he and then boom!  Upar vali line padhke it might seem ironic lol, but you are one of the few genuine people that I have met at IITGN. I definitely regret not having met you earlier than I did and not spending more time with you. You are an amazing person who is always cheerful & so funny! I will really miss those Adani days and I promise I will never let go of the Khushi joke because "Shreyash ketlo Hasmuth chene?" :)  I know you are going to make it big in life and have an amazing life partner. You just need to wait it out, kyuki tu toh sigma he. Voh khud saamme se chalke aayegi :P  Keep smiling, it is very contagious. Keep cracking sarcastic jokes, they work very well coming from an innocent looking guy like you hehe XD  Wishing you all the best for whatever lies ahead for you. I know you are going to nail it! But whatever happens, don't lose your personality. It is very rare!  Thanks for being there. Thanks for everything! ü´Çü´∂

Message: In the realm of uniqueness, I see you shine, A cherished memory of a conversation, divine. Back in the days of quarantine's hold, We spoke for hours, stories untold.  Together we ventured to the sun temple's grace, Sunny rides and hot walks in old Ahmedabad's embrace. Our moments and travels, etched on our faces, Through sweat and laughter, we left traces.  Among the friends that came and went, You remained, tolerating my ignorance and independence, content. A person like you, flexible and true, Like water, adapting to every shape that we knew.  Thank you for journeying with me, empty stomach and sunny days, Through the lanes of history, architecture's maze. My well-preserved bank of secrets, you hold dear, The one with whom I shared and can always share.  You're a shining gold, even after being burned thrice, A light that continues to dazzle, radiating your own device. Though these two years of memories may become the past, I hope our connection endures, destined to last.  So let's continue our tale, as we have before, Writing new chapters, exploring life's core. Together, we'll preserve the bank of secrets we hold, As friends, companions, more valuable than gold.

Message: Rooodwickkk, I don't know where to startttt üòµ‚Äçüí´  Coincidence kahu ya mera itna achcha naseeb ki ham college k first din pe hi mil gaye the. I don't remember what we talked about but I am grateful that we did, kyuki I found one of the most caring, positive, charismatic, enthu, mature and sweetest people I have ever known! Message: Manaaaaaas, I positively, definitely, really don't think I would've got through BTech without you sticking around from the start till the finish. Whatever happened, you were a constant. From just being in awe of your crazy smart brain, playing stellar supporting (ahem ahem) acts in Call of Duty, hogging all that food together, getting Telugu lessons, roasting Ishan, roasting Me, roasting you, playing hours and hours of crashing F1 cars, NBA2k, FIFA and pulling off that crazyyyy extra time win to seal the tournament, giving you amazing free masterclasses on how to get a girlfriend, being your teammate while we ran riot in the Hallabol futsal tournament, and finally all the pointless heated football debates that we drag on for hours, it's been incredible man. Couldn't ask for a better guy to enjoy college with. You're a great guy who looks out for others and I'll always be grateful for having you around. All the best for everything ahead Manas boi, you're on your way to some incredible things!
Name: Faheem

Message: So, it is the deadline day today. Hence I am forced to write something for you. As you know, you come last alphabetically and you also know I cannot break the rule of following an order. I am sorry I missed your message. I guess I should have prioritized you and broke some rules. Anyways, so the message here is you are not getting a guy if you choose this cheesy and picky about things. When you come back to your wall to read this message, in say 2024 or 2025, I want you to read this message and smile. Smile because I was right and you still do not have a boyfriend. No comments on your public love life. I can name all the boys you have loved before but not my place. What happened to Aphasia? I am disappointed that you dropped your interest and moved to motor. But hey hey! If motor is taking you to places, who am I to complain? Get a Coldplay concert soon or whenever they perform. And do not forget to video call me. There are not qualities or aspect of your life I can comment on because they are non-existent. I am pretty sure you had your life full of fun at IITGN. Made friends, made memories, went concerts. So Mumbai friends? Fuck off. This part of your life, this decade, this two years course is not something you will forget. This Hitesh, you will never forget! <3<3<3
Name: Pradhan Hitesh

Message: How can I miss the oppurtunity to write for you my friend? Starting from volleyball sessions to burger, I guess we had our share of memories. Maybe less but impactful with you. Everything made sense with you bro! Life was simple and nice. Not much drama just boy shit. I wish I could turn back time and make time for our craps and relive the moments again. I only have regrets that we could not spend time together. Nevertheless, we grew up. Even if we did not spend time togther, I always wished the best for you and I still do. You are that one friends, even if I do not talk to everyday, I know we still be close. I may not know what you eat, what you are doing in life, what you are watching, but still I feel close and home around you. Comfort level maxx!
Name: Pradhan Hitesh

Bumping into you and More during the first few days on campus was indeed one of the best things that happened to me at iitgn. We sure had a lot of fun during the first 1.5 semesters, playing random things, eating good food, eating more good food (bbq nation will never be forgotten), decimating nations with our android powered guns, and what not. Covid did mess everything up but fast forward to sem 7 and things were back to great again. Tirelessly educating me on Anime and encouraging me to watch some (grand blue was good stuff), dragging you to the mess, research park discussions/rants, you really did help me get through some bad stuff and helped me calm my nerves before many important and crucial things in the last 2 semesters. You're just a genuinely cool dude man, absolutely a fun guy to hang out with, laugh and do random crazy things with. Batch trip would've been, i don't even know how to put it, I wouldn't have had a batch trip without you hanging around. We did explore some places together and you can't begin to imagine how thrilled I was when you got to the top of that peak. It's been great trying to help you scale mountains xD. Discovering that you were a Vijay fan and that you were crazy about south indian movies was one of the best surprises on campus. Jhabua stories are gold, hoping to witness a water and alcohol wedding. I am proud that I have a friend who will reply at 3:47 AM. The confidence I have while texting you at those hours is unmatched. Please try and support a team other than Tottenham. Please. I am super proud of you ,going to one of the best institutes and learning new things that you're so passionate about. You explaining the beauty of math or describing complex mathematical problems to me is like that meme with the sorry dog with the paavam face trying ever so hard to understand. But I listened nonethless. Glad to have been a part of your life in college man and yeah, we're defnitely staying in touch, no doubt. Just... clean your room sometime, and let people put that leg on your bed.

And  I hope tujhe aage jaakr TT khelna aajaye (which ik is not possible). Still, I will keep supporting and teaching. Message: Mai jab bhi BTech ko yaad karunga (and krta hun), toh sabse pehle ‚Äúshrreya‚Äù naam hi yaad ayega (ata hai). FP mein mile, coordi bane. Mere best roomies (#333) ki wajah se dosti hui - shauk tha mujhe tab logon ki help krne ka :) And mujhe sahi mein nhi laga tha ki btech ke baad tu meri legitttt best friend hogi - meri go to person for EVERYTHING. And itni memories hai unpack krne ke liye ki shayad website bhi handle na kar paye. Isiliye vo letters & long msgs hai aapke liye. Teri unique hassi, tera duckling ki tarah peeche peeche chalna, and tera epic level humility (jo video call krte hue bhi apni screen badi rakhti h üòÇ) ingrained hai mere dimaag mein. Courses toh ace kiye hai saath mein - the only person who matches meri frequency harrrr way mein. And mujhe tera mera Nikita ka Eureka experience hmesha yaad rahega bhai - God dikhe the na hume uss din :)‚Ä®Mujhe sahi mein smjh nhi aata hum itne similar kaise hai - preferences mein bhi zyada farak hai nhi vaise :) And mai kuchh bhi bolun kum hi rahega, but haan vo batch trip meinc chor bazar wali ladki ko strepsils dena is one of mera core memories. But batch trip ke saare core memories tere saath hi hai anyway :) And bhai vo Jammu trip and snowball fight - and mere epic targetted shots (bonus) best memories hai. Hum humesha ek doosre ko sacrifice karte rahenge and keep on brainwashing people for me :) Also ab toh hum expert hai mangoes todhne mein (#AiseKaiseFekSaktaHai). Tere key phrases - ‚ÄúJaa na‚Äù, ‚ÄúChhi‚Äù imprint ho chuke tere parrot pe. Apki wajah se toh hum 4 am sabarmati bhi gaye hai - inconvenience ke 1 lac feel free to PayTM. Humne toh puppy-like-people ko bhi kaante dikhaye h udhar ke :) And mumbai trip mein imagica, jammu mein best snow sab tere saath hi kiye hai and im forever grateful uske liye. And haan meri acting skills ke toh kya hi kehne - TT toh kya mast khelta hun! And bas aise hi attention lete rehna salesforce mein bhi. And ill say it again, hume bhand hone ki zaroorat hai hi nhi üôÇ‚Ä®But seriously, you are the best thing of my 21 years - soulmate friends exist krte hai ab pta chalta hai. And I seriously wish (and know) tu jahan bhi jayegi machayegi - you turn everything to diamond. Teri aadat hai top krna irrespective of field and tera always positive attitude is contagious. And please please kabhi charm mat loose krna. Tere jo bhi wishes hai sab satisfy hongi, dil se maangta hun. Humesha haste and khush rehna. Humara hasna hi humari pehchan hai üôÇ And hum kabhi bhi milen, party mat dena, even out of courtesy. I request.
Name: Nipun Mahajan

All the beautiful friendships in my life have been unexpected. Our friendship was too. Thank you for tolerating both my presence and absence as a roommate. Thank you for introducing me to new books, delicious food. You made me realize that life needs to be savored rather than just lived. To all the subway meals we have shared, expensive food we pined for, fictional characters we obsessed over, I cannot imagine doing that with anyone else. You made me strawberry tea when I was bawling my eyes out and You scolded me when I was chasing after that perfect draft for an assignment. Some peoples‚Äô influence on you cannot be erased. I regret to inform you that you count as one of them in my life. So I am gonna just make a few edits here and there and tweak this message.  Just kidding ! As for ‚Äúnolite te bastardes carborundorum‚Äù, I will try my best , no promises though! This is the message. Someone who had felt less might have written more. Rahi

Profile_Biography: Mastered in procrastination and the art of balancing mess plates. IIT Gn, you made me strong.

Message: Areyy Guntyaa 6th sem ke baad poora Resume same ho gaya tha apna. Sab MSE projects saath me hi kiye hai, aur jo nahi kiye uski sajah bhi mili hai. Jinke "U" se naam shuru hote hai, unke piche 'CH' laga do (*D*sha best!)  4 saal ke Ganpati me same Red-Yellow kurta. Pearl Sabour ka apna pose. 4th Sem me harr assignment ke baad Aadhya pe baithna. Kitida navyane@Arya Ambekar.  Khushi ke do pal - Miami PhD offer milna, DP ka 1st payment. Dukh ke do pal - Project Course me gandi grade, Garmi 2 summers me, Foosball aur Carrom, LaPinoZ Monsters, Gir ki trip ka bus ride. Aur bohttt kuch ... Cheers to all the common crushes aur saari dekhi hui lightnings !
Name: Soham Shirodkar

Message: Yorkerr, tune last sem me boht Yorker daale hai mereko. Tere 1 v 9 photo ke competition me takkar diya hai maine tereko. Job lagne ke baad tera smartness thoda jyada hi badh gaya. E-369 me baith ke Zavzavat vaale reels, Carrom ki takkar, Ganpati'22 ki mehnat(tere pappa ki nahi), G117 ka COVID quarantine. aur Summer me Chaitanya ka sanyas mode chalu hone ke baad vali bitching. Apne Monsoon trek ki planning chalu kar, milte udhar hi !
Name: Soham Shirodkar

Message: Saale boht log tereko ab tak shaant samajhte hai par SIMP to hai vo sabko samajh gaya. Ek to 3rd year me jaake mila tu, par 1 saal me hi boht close ho gaya. Hallabol ka Khokho algorithm, Tu vs Yorker, raat ko 2 baje VS ka only member (after More ka heartbreak), CSE Mode, G ki chhat pe slides, Pearl Sabour OP!, "Kyu mai ye Cake nahi khaa sakta?" aur last "Agar More aur Yorker ki maaramari ho to kaun jeetega?" . Zomato ka khaake thoda vajan badha, fir Sankush ki Capsule Ride me chalenge firse ! Chalo thodi acchi baate bhi - Teri ML me 12/10 ka kissa sunaata rahunga logoko. sabse smart banda. Sirf interest ke vajah se pura TL sambhala. Do personalities rakh le khud ke, ek 1st year ka aur 4th year ka. Batchtrip ka fashion sense hame bhi sikhaana. All the best !
Name: Soham Shirodkar

Message: Vo More hai, haa vo More hi hai !.(Wet index = -2 actually) Last year infinite memories hai apni. Boht jagah rejections khaaye hai dono ne but we had each other's backs always. Like Pantheon the unbreakable sheild (ya jo bhi jo tune mere darwaje pe lagaya tha) I will be the support. COVID ke time jaise ripped hoke aana ab Norway se. Pearl Sabour ka only member jo mere sath raat ko kitne bhi baje ho par VS jaroor aata tha. Ab sone se pehle good night kisko bolunga. L**** Council ka Head L****. Council members ka dhyan rakhna. Ganpati ke time pe upar chadke lagaye hue patthar yaad rakhna aur Majnu bhai ke darshan bhool jana. Teri ladkiyo ko ditch karke mere sath bhi movies dekh leta kabhi. Flute pe ek hi gaana sikhaya hai tereko uska use karna kahi pe. Ab tu matka ho gaya hai to lame jokes chal jayenge. Zero ego vala aadmi pehli baar deka hai maine. All best boi !
Name: Soham Shirodkar

Message: Sanku shet. Rishikesh me jo pyaar bhari baate ki hai tune aur glass phode hai, vo to core memory ban chuki hai ab. Garlic bread ke baad spaceship tour nahi bhulunga. Hybrid Marathi + Gujrati. Ravi Sastri ki bitching kar ab LA me jaake!
Name: Soham Shirodkar

Message: You were the 'Silver' to this Biswa. Anyone in Mogu Mogu told me to do something I wouldn't and once you commanded I would do it. Met you in first year in the mess and been together since. If it wasn't for you I wouldn't have joined basketball not that I stayed till the end. Mr. Fresher, pro basketball  player and what not you are an all rounder. You've been the figure I looked up to when I wanted to improve myself. It just feels like yesterday  you were in your room saying More nahi aya and I would be just outside calling you for the 8am class on Maths. The most genuine and down to earth hardworking fellow I met. IIM me macha dena. All the best.

Message: First year me ES 112 me saath me baithte the. Tab tere saamne gaali dene me bhi sharam aati thi aur ab dekho rise my glorious creation. Engineering graphics ke time saath me TL pe bean bags pe soye the. Sab projects tere saath hi the mere. G me helikopter helikopter aur Demon slayer opening sunake pareshaan kiya tujhe aur Gandhi ko. Compilers ke lectures me kya hi maze aate the. Online semesters me hi apne dost bane. Jab Saket Sir waala intern laga kya hi accha laga, sirf yaar apna paper saath me nahi hai. Agar Academia aane ka mann kiya toh saath me FOCS/STOC aur SODA me publish karenge. Pikachu ka fan, hardworking talented banda jisko sab aata hai. Zomato me free khana ka kuch intezaam karna agle saal ki teri salary merese hi aane waali hai XD. Aur haa Delhi se bhabhi laana hum logo ke liye Pearl Zindabaad.
Name: Yash More
Hitarth Gandhi
Profile_Biography: Some amazing people, some wonderful memories, some tasty food and then some awesome laughs ;)

Message: Hi Vidya(CSV)! EG ke projectme pahili baat hui though I remembered your peculiar voice saying 'one fourteen' during FP informals. I couldn't have completed my electrical engineering without you. It started with you coming over to see me during the quarantine in K. Though I was the CR, but you were the one pulling the strings. Jabhi bhi tere room me aya badhiya quotes hi mile. Hegde Sir ka "Ok." reply pe hasna, EM Waves ke tutorial solve karne ke liye puri raat jage the aur baadme Naran sir ke class me jaakar doze off karne lage the. assignments se free hoke OAT, aur block 4 ka chath jaane me bahut maza aata tha. I'm sorry that I've been rude to you multiple times. I enjoyed the Auli ka trek with you and the sliding in snow and making snow angels. DSP ke assignment me jab ek dusre ke phones pe awaaz aate the ek dusre ke alag hi sense of achievement milta tha. The third assignment of DSP was impossible without you. I couldn't come to drop you at the airport on the last day but I'll make it up to you and thanks for the T-Shirt. Keep smiling because you have a lot of teeth. A million headpats to you.
Name: Yash More

Message: Bhai jitni bhi baat hui tujhse bahut badhiya banda tha. Hamesha aake Keanu Reeves bolta tha mujhe. Never felt lesser than John Wick. Al the best bhai.

Message: Hey Sameer kaisa hai bhai, first time basketball court pe mulakat hue thi, tab pata nai tha itni ghere dosti ho jayegi.  Pata he nai chala kab 4 saal nikal gaye, aisa lagata hai abi tau apan college aye the, wo exam se ek raat phele baith kar future planning karna, kaha bhar jana hai, kya khana hai, wo sab bhut yaad ata hai ab. Apan  tau covid mai bi sath he the, subah subah running jana, gym, aur phir pael ke kahana (cheat meal kab cheat week mai aur phir kab month mai badal jati pata he nahi chalata). Par jo bi ho tere sath maza bhut aya, tu dil ka ekdum saaf hai, jo hota hai sab bol deta. Tere travel management bi gajab ka hai.  Wo tere gf patane ki tips tau college mai kuch kam aye nahi, par comedy achi hote thi.  Tere wajah se he apna pura group itna ghoom paya, warna ham tau room pe he pade rahte the. Tere introvert se extrovert ke journey dekhe hai ham sabne, sab kuch experience kia tune college mai, aur badia karna life mai, aise he phodte rahna, apne upar confidence rakhna, tu kuch bi kar sakta hai. Chal bhut likh dia flow flow maii, milte rahenge apan tau. Bye Champ!!!!

Message: Ready for some cringe? Here we go! From that first saturday to last saturday we are still meeting almost everyday to do the same boring ass kinda shit while judging others and thinking we are better. From touching you inappropriately to making cringe statements, i have loved everything since the expression of your face is invaluable. But there wouldn't have been a sane version of me without you and there wouldn't be my faith in blith without you, so thanks for being that figure to me. I hope you always remain this smart, calm and short tempered but also become a little supportive of pride so i can have my side act. Lmao, this is getting disturbing now. Always be the 2002 you are and no matter what goes down, you can always count on me. Aa raha hu mai pittsburgh to eat that lasagna! Cheers till then (hopefully lol)! Message: This place may be limited, I know your way with ups and down at this college, but I want to express that you are not just a friend to me, but a true savior who rescued me from the clutches of a monotonous campus life. You have been my partner in crime, whether it was indulging in harmless mischief or joining me in our late-night adventures of covertly stalking girls (from your database hehe..) and boys(just for fun). The thrill of being food enthusiasts, relishing in the glory of pizzas and dosas.   What sets our friendship apart is our ability to truly understand one another. I have listened to your netagiri, your political ambitions, and your dreams of becoming the future PM of India. While we may have differing ideologies, it has never hindered our bond. In fact, it has only strengthened our friendship, as we respect and appreciate each other's unique perspectives.   Through thick and thin, you have always been there for me. You have supported me during challenging times and motivated me to strive for my goals. As I reflect on our journey together, I realize that you are more than just a friend; you are an invaluable companion who has impacted my life in profound ways. Our countless conversations, shared laughter, and unforgettable adventures have created memories that will last a lifetime. I want to express my deepest gratitude for being the amazing friend that you are. Your friendship has enriched my life, and I am truly blessed to have you by my side. No matter where life takes us, I am confident our bond will remain unbreakable. Here's to the countless memories we have created and the adventures ahead. Cheers to our extraordinary friendship! All the best‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.. Khush raho database badhate raho !!!Sign!!!.

Message: IshAAn, where do I start. I don‚Äôt know how ‚Äòvo jo TT khel rha vo mere school ke ek ladke jaisa lagta hai‚Äô se yaha tak aa gaye ham. Literally kuchhhh bhi bol sakti hu tujhe, kuch bhi, because kabhi judge hone ka darr hi nhi. You have supported me in times I didn‚Äôt expect anyone to. Thank you for all the times you realized I was hurt, and tried to do something about it. Thank you for always making me feel included and teaching me things without ever making me feel dumb. Not a lot of people can do that, trust me. I want you to know ki life me kitne bhi naye log mile, the real ones can never be replaced, aur tu to bilkul nhi, kyunki tere jitne lame jokes maarne ki capacity hi nhi kisi me. Thank you for showing me that men can be sensitive too, you are a real one Eshan! Irritate to tu bohot karta hai but itna support and equally vulnerable hoke share karna ki alag level ka comfort aa jae saamne wale ko, esa sab nhi kar sakte. You are one of the most brilliant people I‚Äôve met, and I am so glad we are gonna have so many stories to tell our kids one day. Message: Ashwani the Rai, kya jaldi jaldi bade ho gaye na ham (in Kalki‚Äôs voice). It‚Äôs not common for me to be short of words but that‚Äôs exactly how I feel right now because no words can do justice to the impact we have on each other‚Äôs lives. You have always been this energy, this positive influence, that magically puts everything in place. There is absolutely no way I can imagine my B.Tech without you, my backbone, my number one cheerleader, and in the truest sense, my best friend. The BESTTT part after a long day is bitching about people hehe. Workspace me guru songs ke classical part pe lip sync karna while dying of laughter, gaali bolne wale ghatiya hote hai se har sentence me 4 gaali ez, and before everything, being someone I can blindly trust, supporting my every move selflessly, to teaching me to be the bigger person. I seriously don‚Äôt know how I would have turned out if it weren‚Äôt for meeting you, but you have made me grow so much as a person and I have healed so much. I don‚Äôt care who reads this but this is literally the LEAST I can say about us. Ashwani, saala har kisiko itna accha lagta hai, can hit it off with anyone, YES i envy this, but also one of things I love. That‚Äôs enough ego boosting for today ig? You are welcome for an amazing wardrobe and way better grammar. Let‚Äôs binge a million more series and win at life together!

Message: Go-to guy for anything and everything. The kindest and most selfless person I know. Always there for literally everyone, no bhed bhav. Nerd? Geek? Weeb? All of these. How do you never run out of things to talk about? The gyaan, the tweets, the useless conversations, the unnecessary arguments, the 4 AM debates over how social media controls or does not control our minds, the Blith rants, the IITGN rants, the juniors ch***** hai rants, and rants about literally anything. Matching vibes every step of the way. Have talked to you and listened to you talk about so many things I can't remember. Have also witnessed rare angry-Rushik moments. The man who is the last one to sleep and the first one to wake up and go have breakfast. The man who always knows the answer, right or wrong. The gamer. The player. The genius. The future Professor. But mostly, the nonstop yapper.

Message: Halo meri peri peri Chhonalll. You were the best roommate I ever had. kitne maje kiye apan ne 310 mein!! tune mera har jagah wait kiya, khana khate time, brush karte time, haath dhote time..main Tehedil se teri shukrguzar hun iss cheez ke liye.. tu ek bohot patient aur understanding ladki hai..main jb bhi ruthi tu mujhe manane aayi. kbhi give up nhi kiya. teri yehi cheez meri nazar mein tujhe dusro se alag karti hai. kitni saari baate ki apan ne. ek dusre ke culture ke baare mein batate rehte the bohot kuchh janne mila teri wajah se. Election ke time campaigning mein bhi tune kitni help ki meri. Door knock karna bhi tere se hi sikha.. khana kitna khaya apan ne saath. Tu akeli meri jaisi thi jo itna khati thi tere saath khana khake bohot maja aaya. Tera multiple bottles eksaath bhar ke lane ka talent lajawab hai. keep it up. Also jis accuracy se tu neend mein type karti hai woh tarif ke layak hai. Mtlb ki insaan ko ek hi jhatke mein samajh aa jaye itni OP accuracy. tere is quality ki tarif raghvan sir bhi ki hai. Tu mere liye savior thi merko namak lake diya tune mess se maine 1.5 semester use kiya usko. koi bhi cheez simple krke deti thi tu. mere jhallepane se jo nuksaan hota mera woh teri wajah se bacha hai kai baar. aaj din tk mujhe mails batati hai tu ki yeh aaya hai woh aaya hai aur main aaj bhi waisi ki waisi hun. jhalli.  Tu ek bohot mast ladki hai jo khudko jo achha lage woh karti hai baki log kya sochenge iske baare mein nhi sochti. yeh bohot achhi baat hai teri. bohot hi pyari hai yaar tu sonal. bohot miss karungi main tujhe hamesha. Thank you for everything...Hamesha khush rehna aur contact mein rehna. May all your wishes come true...

Message: Hello, Papa! Where do I even begin? Was it because of COVID? One of the few things I will be grateful to the pandemic for is you. You are the person I can turn to for anything and everything! Emaina kaani parigethukuntu vachesedaanni nee room ki. Honestly, I wish we had met a little earlier, but it's alright. I cannot thank you enough! Assal em thochatle em raayalo.. I can't get over the sense of comfort I feel when I simply sit in your room. I don't even have to engage in a conversation with both of you. I would like to borrow your words and say, "I will treasure you for life." Perhaps one day when both of us are in Vijayawada, we can go to Durga gudi together!‚ú® I must admit, going to your room after you left was a bad idea :) Anddd Tere Hawaale will forever remind me of you both <3

Message: "When I thought I was Pantheon the Unbreakable Spear but her surname was 'Bhale'kar." Thank you for the Diwalicha pharal felt like home after a long time. I haven't thrown the box yet. The doodle that you made which I stuck over the wall. I have it here with me in Bergen as one of the 'important documents'. Was waiting for an eagle one though. I remember all our talks, where you were like Meera said this Meera said that, experiment redesign karo.  You'd throw a random Matlab code at me whose documentation I never saw and expected me to explain it. Ranting over academia and having each other's back on Idk what problems. You are worthy enough that I skipped my league game for you.  Those midnight walks to idk where, contemplating research and life in general. You were a victim of me pushing people to watch anime. Wanted to watch Spy X Family Season 2 with you. Don't underestimate yourself at any point in your life, and I believe in you. All the best for your future.

Message: Hello Shrriyaaa, first year se mene yeh suna hai ki teri roommate ka number de wo bohot sundar hai. Never knew ki fourth year tak aate aate room pe line lagne ka reason mei hone wali hu. Mene harr baar teri bohot tarif ki hai when it comes to acads, tu jiss tarah se concept to nichhod leti thi, oof commendable. Tune unknowingly mera kaafi dhyaan rakha hai, be it your besan laddoos, dry fruits. Mujhe aaj bhi yaad hai, mei blith ke liye SA office jaati thi bina breakfast kiye and tu zabardasti mere haath mei dry fruits and mere muh mei laddoo thoos deti thi. After lockdown thode dur dur chale gae lekin fir I-3rd floor pe firse kaafi close aa gae. You know all the kaand I have done, jitna raita failaya hai, sab kuch. Tu wahi hai, jisko agar mei kuch sad and depressing batau toh pehle toh tu zor zor se hasegi, fir kuch solution toh degi nahi, but saath humesha rahegi. The best part of our friendship is ki 1st year se 4th year tak aate aate tera fashion sense at least thoda sa accha hua hai. Yaad hai, aibaan mei all blue shades pehne the tune and 4th year mei kuch super cool crops with bell bottoms, vgood! 2nd year se velli baithi hai kyuki salesforce. Sending a flying kiss and next time mile toh hug karegi?

Bane the and throughout college me dost Bane hi rahe aage bhi abhi me Noida aaunga to sath me aur time spend karenge.  Tere sath photos kam hai par memories bahot bahot bahot jyada hai jaise ki 1st sem me teri chhapal lele me tuje chimair ki lobby me dodata tha.  Jhuma ma'am ke course me jab me deadline ke 1 minute ke pahele submission karta tha uske bad ham tera assignment start karte the and 1 week ke bad submit karte the üòÇ. TA's and Ma'am bhi pareshan rahti thi üòÅ.  For usi sem me management course me Tera KFC(Kewat food counter üòé) ke startup ka idea jabarjast tha vo alag baat hai ki instructor ko pasand nahi aaya tha üòÅ.  Aur 7th sem me jis consistency ke sath tune padhai kiti vo tarif ke kabil hai and last me NVG sir ke last assignment me tera contribution me jindagi bhar yad rakhunga us samay tera dedication and presence of maind ke Karan hi ham bade khatare se bache the.  Despite of that tune kafi baar ham sab ko khana bana ke bhi kilaya hai apne "kewat da dhaba" me üòÅ. In sab kuch ke liye bahot thanks . One more thing, sirf tere Karan me squash Sikh paya uske liye special thanks. Har Roz subah tu and Darda muje subah uthate the squash khelne ke liye and muje squash ki bahot sari technique bhi tune hi sikhayi. Aaj bhi muje tera drop shot in squash bahot impressive lagta hai. Squash se aane ke bad ghanto tak insta reels dekhana bhi me miss karungaüòÖ. Tune hamesha muje nayi chize sikhane ke liye motivate Kiya hai. Aise hi sab ko motivate karte rahna and I hope you have bright future ahead. Abhi bhi kahne ke liye bahot kuch hai ye memories to apne kand ki 1% bhi nahi hai but itna likhane jaunga to jagah bhi kam pad jayegi. Lastly ham hamesh best friend rahenge and contact me rahenge kewat bhaiüòé.

Message: Tera likhte likhte mei pakka rone lagg jaungi. First interaction hi itna wierd tha, tu AC leakage ki complaint karne aai thi aur mei hostel mei entry le rahi thi, kisko pata tha ki aaj itne inseparable ho jaenge. Glad to have chosen you as my roommate for the following years. Tu meri therapist thi in terms of audio stories sunana, alexa pe songs, teri poems (ruk uspe aati hu thodi der mei), tera mere liye grocery se kuch le ana, I'll miss all this. And haa, tujhe lagta hai na ki meri tera phone nahi uthati kyuki tu exactly tab call karti hai jab mei nahane gai hui hoti hu (lekin sach toh yeh hai ki mei tereko ignore kar rahi thi, hehe). Teri kavitae itni gehari aur itni true-hearted hoti hai and on a very serious note, mei tujhe unn youtube audio stories ki tarah sunna chahti hu ek dinn, I really want ki tu iss art ko broadcast kare. I love how you deeply appreciate language and say, "A culture dies if its language dies." Teri liye bohot respect yaar. Tu jaise logo ko, rishto ko, sabko baandh ke rakhti hai, wo mei shayad hi kabhi kar paungi. And it is actually because of you I realised ki I am not alone or the battles I am fighting are also fought by others at their own pace. Teri kinare wali poem ki mujhse zyada badi fan nahi ho sakti koi. I love you for every single thing except one, tune mere adarsh ko mere se chinn liya hai. New phone aane ke baad se tera moment ko capture karna is a boon and also a bane, uss habit ko balance karr lena. BBhaiiiii, bohot pyaar karti hu terese and agar mei call naa karu, toh please tu kar dena. Love you yaarrr, apne alfazo se logo ka dil jeet te rehna!

Message: Broooo, firse ek kaand ho gaya yaaarrrr! I never imagined us to share such a bond but 4th year made it happen. Our first deepest interaction at I-terrace led us to all 'mess at 7' meals. All that I find missing in my personality, I have found that you. I genuinely learnt a lot from you, A LOT! Your creativity, your puns, your sheer common sense, your simple subtle dressing sense, your silent savage, I love it all. Not gonna say phhod dena in cmu because that's given. Will surely let you know how many more will get added to the list of probables :) You know, you were(are) my go-to person whenever I did some kaaannnd and so you had to bare with me for hours in the mess. Glad to have pulled off leela, LA ke casino mei aag lagana baaki hai and we'll pull that off too. CMU not very far and my phd savings are magnetically pulling me towards you, pakka will see you there soon!

Message: Bro tujhse milna meri destiny mei likha tha! Tu nahi hoti toh yeh Isha firse apne paero pe khadi nahi ho paati. Somewhere deep down I feel ki wo process control wala kaand jo hua tha, wo acche ke liye hua tha kyuki uske baad apne bond ki trajectory alag hi direction mei chali gai. Mene kahi padha tha ki harr extrovert ko ek introvert best friend chahiye hota hai and mere liye wo tu hai. Trustworthyyyyy maxxxxx hai tu and bohot respect hai yaar tere liye. Aaj bhi mujhe bohot acche se yaad hai jab tune raatko milne bulaya tha and 4 baje tak we both cried our heart out. Meri story kabhi itne deeply batane ka time nahi mila lekin yeh zarur keh sakti hu ki, mei tujhe bohot zyada samaj sakti hu. Aur yahi bohot badi wajah hai ki mei kabhi bhi apne rishte ke bich kisi ko aane nahi dungi. Mere liye full campus ek side aur tu ek side hai (and undoubtedly, tera side zyada weigh karta hai). Tera kaafi ehsaan rahega mujhpe and mene lakh galtiyan ki hai, unn sab ke liye please maaf kar dena. I promise, I will never hurt others due to some of my 'skills.' Sikr nahi aa paai yaar, shayad kabhi aur, zarur. Teri shaadi mei sabse aage naagin dance mei hi karungi and uske pehle tujhe wo bante dekhna chahti hu jo tune mujhe promise kiya tha. Tu bohot strong hai and I know tu jaha bhi rahegi, waha apni iss strength se and apni pure-heartedness lifelong bonds bana legi. Stay this pure-hearted always, jo sabka dil se accha chahti hai
Name: Isha Bayad

Message: FP mei jisne start-up ke sapne dekhe hai, wo aaj unhe poora karne nikal pada hai; and I am sure ki karr lega! Nikharv yaar, bohot sahi banda hai tu, bohot respect tere liye. And haa, sivapriya ma'am ki favorite banke, tera favorite wala tag steal karne ke liye sorryy. Last one year mei kaafi life-changing decision making process mei involved thi mei tere saath and meri lakh naive galtiyon ki bawajud, tune mujhe kaafi help kiya hai. I got to learn a lot from you and I very well know ki tu macha dega life mei!! Also, bada aadmi banne ke baad bhul mat jana.
Name: Isha Bayad

Message: Insha, same as my name with an extra 'n' and bohot sweet personality. From 1st year longest hair to 4th year short hair, tumhari kindness overflow hoti chali gai. Jitna bhi time saathme spend kiya, bohot mazza aaya. Kuch bada karna life mei!! All the very best
